Base Map


```{r, warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}

longitude <- data$longitude
latitude <- data$latitude
volcano_name <- data$volcano_name

m <- leaflet() %>% # leaflet 
addTiles() %>% # setup the default OpenStreetMap map tiles
addMarkers(lng = longitude, lat = latitude, popup = "volcano") # add a single point layer

m

```
